---
name: Pull Request Template
about: Use this template for submitting changes to The Failed Projects Registry.
title: "[TYPE]: Short description of the change"
labels: ["enhancement"]
assignees: []
---

## Description

Please provide a clear and concise description of the changes in this pull request.
What problem does it solve? What new features does it add?

## Checklist:

Before submitting this pull request, please ensure the following:

- [ ] I have reviewed my own code.
- [ ] My changes are limited to a single logical concept.
- [ ] My JSON entry (if applicable) adheres to the `data/schema.json` (once created) and `data/registry.json` schema.
- [ ] All required fields are present and correctly formatted.
- [ ] This pull request links to the issue it resolves (e.g., `Closes #XYZ`).

## Related Issue

Please link the issue that this pull request addresses (e.g., `Closes #123` or `Fixes #456`).

## Type of change

Please delete options that are not relevant.

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Other (please describe):

## Further comments
